long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds an extra filter for Leading2Lean skill matrix table.
It allows the user to hide unwanted columns from the table.
v1.1 now also remove the general station from scrap declaration
v1.2 remove redundant permissions
v1.3 modified default dispatch screen
v1.4 modified dispatch screen again
v1.5 fixed a few bugs that were affecting the wrong elements
v1.6 fixed general station going missing when is shouldn't
v1.7 small date fix when requesting scrap data
v1.8 small bug fix for lines with more than 30 stations
v1.9 new clock in feature, after skill training
v1.91 fixed a small bug related to scrap
v2.0.0 Major update, made available for multiple divisions
v2.0.1 Small workaround for station selection
v2.02 Corrected a very small bug
v2.03 Corrected a very small bug
v2.04 Fixed a bug where users images would not be displayed correctly
v2.05 Reworked skills page into a, hopefully, more user-friendly layout
v2.06 Changed the way skills button behaves in the new table, it now opens an iframe with the selected skill instead of navigating to the skills page and then back.
v2.07 Added auto click on edit button in skills page
v2.08 Added "Operator count" and "Scrap count" KPI cards to "line side display" dashboard
v2.09 Added "Current target" pill to "line side display" dashboard
v2.11 Fixed some style bugs, and machine selection filtering
v2.12 Added current target to demand card on current target view, and recalculating efficiency based on that target
v2.13 Fixed a bug where having two line side displays opened in separate tabs caused the second to overwrite the first
v2.14 Fixed a small bug where efficiency would be NaN instead of 0 if line didn't work
v2.15 Modified l2l efficiency calculation when on demand tab and made shift downtime green if value is 0
v2.16 Added two-way filtering of quicktext and stations based on selection
v2.17 Added auto-login feature to delmia
v2.18 Added delmia auto-login feature toggle
v2.19 Added security feature, modified machine technology codes to accept more than on technology per machine
v2.20 Small change to the way delmia login works, now the extension stops if the password or user is wrong; added more options to turn on or off features
v2.21 Small change to manifest
v2.22 Added another plant
v2.23 Added auto-login for a specific division app
v2.24 Updated due to breaking changes introduced by operator portal update
v2.26 Updated due to breaking changes introduced by checklist edit update
v2.27 Fixed a small bug on lineside display, that caused months to get calculated incorectly
v2.29 Added monaco editor script for thingworx composer
